newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: NWE oil products - gas oil down, fuel oil holds.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products - gas oil down, fuel oil holds.

text.p: NWE oil products opened mixed on Friday, gas oil drawn down by lower futures, while fuel oil held at Thursday's closing levels, dealers said.
Heating oil barges were about $2 a tonne weaker as IPE June futures came off. Offers for both prompt and first half June delivery were at around June IPE +$2 fob Rotterdam. Buyers were $1 lower.
High sulphur fuel oil barges were steady, offered at $82/$82.50 fob Rotterdam. Very few buyers came forward and bunker demand was low.
